title: Setup Employee Groups
describe: Use any parameter to setup distinct employee groups to implement policies

title: The Definitive Rule Engine
describe: Configure ANY policy - and if you can't configure it, we promise to work on it for free

title: Customized Reports
describe: Setup the reports that you want using our seamless reporting enine.

title: Superior Employee Experience
describe: Manage all expenses and travel requests easily. Empower your employees with personalized reports.

title: Easy Integrations
describe: Integrate with your upstream, HRMS or your downstream finance system to seamlessly deliver value through our Open APIs.

title: Configurable Workflows
describe: Configure approvals or rejections. Escalations and reports. At will. Setup new groups.

title: Scan any Bill
describe: The world's best OCR system backs up this product. All data goes in. 99% success.

title: AI-Based Concierge
describe: Ask the concierge to change things during your travel - and it will trigger relevent actions 24x7.

title: AI-Assisted Trip Planning
describe: Just tell us what you want to do in normal language and we will try and put together the best itinerary for you.
